trans-unit.note: Button to add a new item
Button to return to the previous view
Button to cancel an action
Button to clear the current value
Button to continue to the next step
Button to dismiss a view, when the user is finished with it
Button to hide the selected item
Button to open a menu of additional actions for the current item
Button to cancel an action, making it clear it will be possible to do this again later
Button to dismiss an alert
Button to show related settings in the Settings app on iOS
Button to show related settings in the System Preferences app on macOS
Button used in an alert to quit the app
Button to save the current changes
Button to begin a search
Button that changes a list of items to select or edit mode
Button to open the settings view
Button that shows fewer rows in a table
Button that shows more rows in a table
Button used in an alert to open a web site with more information
Button to automatically send all crash reports
Button to ignore a crash report, without sending it

trans-unit.source: Would you like to send a report so we can fix the problem?
trans-unit.target: Möchten Sie einen Bericht senden, damit wir das Problem beheben können?
trans-unit.note: Message for an laert shown after the app has crashed
Button to send a crash report
Title for an alert shown after the app has crashed: '{app name} quit unexpectedly', for example 'Deliveries quit unexpectedly'
Button to delete all archived items
Button to confirm that all archived items should be deleted

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your archive? All of your archived items will be permanently deleted.
trans-unit.target: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie Ihr Archiv löschen wollen? Alle archivierten Lieferungen werden endgültig gelöscht.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether to delete all archived items
Title for an alert related to deleting archived items
Button to delete web site cookies
Message for an alert shown when web site cookies are successfully deleted
Title for an alert related to deleting web site cookies
Button to delete cached location data, used for the map view

trans-unit.source: Your location cache has been cleared.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert shown when location cache data is successfully deleted
Title for an alert related to deleting location cache data
Button to delete saved passwords
Button to confirm that saved passwords should be deleted

trans-unit.source: Some of your passwords could not be deleted. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Einige Ihrer Kennwörter konnten nicht gelöscht werden. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that some saved passwords could not be deleted

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your saved passwords?
trans-unit.target: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie Ihr gespeichertes Passwort löschen wollen?
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming that saved passwords should be deleted

trans-unit.source: All of your saved passwords have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Alle Ihre gespeicherten Kennwörter wurden gelöscht.
trans-unit.note: Message confirming that all saved passwords were successfully deleted

trans-unit.source: All of your saved passwords have been deleted, except for your junecloud.com sync password.
trans-unit.target: Alle Ihre gespeicherten Kennwörter wurden gelöscht, außer Ihrem Kennwort für die Synchronisierung mit junecloud.com.
trans-unit.note: Message confirming that all saved passwords were successfully deleted, except for the Junecloud sync password
Title for an alert related to deleting saved passwords

trans-unit.source: There was an error loading your data
trans-unit.target: Beim Laden Ihrer Daten ist ein Fehler aufgetreten
trans-unit.note: Message shown when there's an error loading the database

trans-unit.source: There was an error saving your data
trans-unit.target: Beim Speichern Ihrer Daten ist ein Fehler aufgetreten
trans-unit.note: Message shown when there's an error saving the database

trans-unit.source: If you continue to see this error, please try deleting and reinstalling the app, or visit junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: Falls Sie diesen Fehler weiterhin erhalten, versuchen Sie bitte die App zu löschen und neu zu installieren oder besuchen Sie junecloud.com/support für Hilfe.
trans-unit.note: Recovery suggestion for a database error on iOS

trans-unit.source: If you continue to see this error, please try resetting your data, or visit junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: Falls Sie diesen Fehler weiterhin erhalten, versuchen Sie bitte ihre Daten zurückzusetzen oder besuchen Sie junecloud.com/support für weitere Hilfe.
trans-unit.note: Recovery suggestion for a database error on macOS

trans-unit.source: This item could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Gegenstand konnte nicht gefunden werden.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when Quick Look is not able to load an item
Button to confirm that the database should be reset

trans-unit.source: There was a problem resetting your data. You may want to try again, or delete and reinstall the app. If you continue to have problems, contact us at junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: Beim Zurücksetzen Ihrer Daten ist ein Problem aufgetreten. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut oder löschen Sie die App und installieren diese neu. Falls Sie diesen Fehler weiterhin erhalten, versuchen Sie bitte ihre Daten zurückzusetzen oder besuchen Sie junecloud.com/support für weitere Hilfe.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the database could not be reset
Title for an alert explaining that the database could not be reset

trans-unit.source: This will delete all of your data and preferences. If your data is not synced with iCloud or Junecloud, it will be lost. If you’re not sure, contact us at junecloud.com/support for help.
trans-unit.target: Dies löscht Ihre Daten und Einstellungen. Falls Ihre Daten nicht mit iCloud oder Junecloud synchronisiert werden, verlieren Sie diese. Falls Sie sich nicht sicher sind, kontaktieren Sie uns unter junecloud.com/support
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether the database should be reset, with an explanation that data will be lost if it is not synced online, and a URL for help

trans-unit.source: Your data and preferences have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Daten und Einstellungen wurden gelöscht.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the database was reset successfully
Title for an alert confirming that the database was reset successfully
Title for an alert confirming whether the database should be reset
Button used to confirm that iCloud sync data should be reset

trans-unit.source: If you’re having problems with iCloud syncing, you may need to reset it. This will delete the app’s sync data from iCloud, then re-sync everything in the app back to iCloud.
trans-unit.target: Falls Sie Probleme mit iCloud Sync haben, müssen Sie diesen eventuell zurücksetzen. Dies löscht die synchronisierten Daten von iCloud und synchronisiert diese erneut aus der App zu iCloud.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether iCloud sync data should be reset, explaining what will happen
Title for an alert confirming whether iCloud sync data should be reset

trans-unit.source: Open the app to update your data
trans-unit.target: Öffne die App um die Daten zu aktualisieren
trans-unit.note: Message shown when the database needs to be updated to use the latest version of the app
Label below a number of days countdown, for example '1 day'
Number of days countdown: {number} day, for example '1 day'
Label below a number of days countdown, for example '8 days'
Number of days countdown: {number} days, for example '8 days'
Label below a number of months countdown, for example '1 month'
Number of months countdown: {number} month, for example '1 month'
Very short label below a number of months countdown when space is limited, for example '1 mo.'
Label below a number of months countdown, for example '3 months'
Number of months countdown: {number} months, for example '3 months'
Very short label below a number of months countdown when space is limited, for example '3 mos.'
{time period} ago, for example '3 minutes ago' or '1 hour ago'. Note: this is currently only used on macOS 10.14.
Elapsed time less than a minute
Menu item to close the current window
Menu item to export an object
Menu item to export all objects (rather than just the selected objects)
Menu item used to export the selected objects (rather than exporting all objects)
Menu item to start a search
Generic name for a web browser used when the actual name is unknown
Menu item to add a new object
Menu item to select the next object in a list
Menu item to open a file
Menu to open a link in a web browser
Menu item to open Page Setup to change print settings
Menu item to paste the clipboard contents
Menu item to select the previous object in a list
Menu item to print
Menu item to open a window to send feedback
Menu item at the bottom of the Share menu that opens System Preferences > Extensions > Share Menu, so more Share options can be added. Only used on macOS.
Title for the about view (credits)
Title for a view where the app icon can be changed
Name for the iCloud sync service

trans-unit.target: Erfahren Sie, wie Sie iCloud aktivieren können
trans-unit.note: Button to open a view that explains how to enable iCloud
Button to open a view with iCloud settings
Short string indicating both iCloud and Junecloud sync are enabled
Button to copy some information about the current device to the clipboard
Button to open a view for creating a new account, used on iOS
Button to open a view for creating a new account, used on macOS
Label for a date setting
Button to open a view for deleting an account
Button to continue the process of deleting an account

trans-unit.source: Deleting your account will remove all of your data from Junecloud sync. Your data will not be removed from any Junecloud apps installed on your devices.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie ihren Account löschen, werden all ihre Daten aus dem Junecloud Sync entfernt. Die Daten werden nicht aus den Junecloud apps auf ihren Geräten entfernt.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming that an account should be deleted
Title for an alert confirming that an account should be deleted
Value for deleting archived items: After {number} Days, for example 'After 90 Days'
Label for a setting that specifies when archived items should be automatically deleted (for example after one year or six months), used on iOS
Label for a setting that specifies when archived items should be automatically deleted (for example after one year or six months), used on macOS
Value for deleting archived items: only delete items manually
Label for a menu item to delete all archived items, used on macOS. A confirmation dialog will appear before any action is taken.
Value for deleting archived items: after six months
Value for deleting archived items: after one year

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available in demo mode.
trans-unit.target: Diese Funktion steht im Demo-Modus nicht zur Verfügung.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that a feature is not available in a demo version of the app
Short label for an email input field
Subject line for an email message with feedback: '{app name} Feedback', for example 'Deliveries Feedback'
Title for a view to send feedback
Title for the general settings view

trans-unit.target: Erfahren Sie mehr zu diesen Einstellungen
trans-unit.note: Button to open a help view with more information
Title for the help view
Name for the Junecloud sync service
Button to open a view with Junecloud sync settings

trans-unit.target: Erstellen Sie einen neuen Junecloud Account.
trans-unit.note: Message shown above a form to create a new Junecloud account

trans-unit.source: Sign in to your Junecloud account.
trans-unit.target: Melden Sie sich mit Ihrem Junecloud Account an.
trans-unit.note: Message shown above a form to sign in to a Junecloud account
Title for a view used to sign in to Junecloud Sync
Title for the keyboard shortcuts settings view
A format used (usually on macOS) when a separator, like a colon (:) should appear after a setting label. '{setting label}:', for example 'Sort By:' or 'Sync:'
Label for a setting to enable logging

trans-unit.target: Logging für die Apple Watch aktivieren
trans-unit.note: Label for a setting to enable logging on Apple Watch

trans-unit.source: If something isn’t working right, turn on logs and recreate the problem. Then return here, tap Share Logs, then “Send to Junecloud”.
trans-unit.target: Falls etwas nicht korrekt funktioniert, aktivieren Sie die Logs und stellen Sie das Problem nach. Kehren Sie dann hierher zurück, tippen Sie “Logs teilen” und “An Junecloud senden”.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining when debug logs might be useful and how to share them, used on iOS

trans-unit.source: If something isn’t working right, turn on logs and recreate the problem. Then return here, click Show Logs, and send the files to us.
trans-unit.target: Falls etwas nicht korrekt funktioniert, aktivieren Sie die Logs und stellen Sie das Problem nach. Kehren Sie dann hierher zurück, klicken Sie “Logs teilen” und “An Junecloud senden”.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining when debug logs might be useful and how to share them, used on macOS
Button to share log files
Button to reveal log files in a file browser
Title for debug log settings view

trans-unit.target: Logs von der Apple Watch übertragen
trans-unit.note: Button to transfer log files from Apple Watch to iPhone

trans-unit.source: Currently there aren’t any logs to send. Make sure logs are enabled, use the app to recreate your problem, and then try again later.
trans-unit.target: Aktuell gibt es keine Logs zum Verschicken. Stellen Sie sicher, dass die Logs aktiviert sind und stellen Sie das Problem nach. Kehren Sie dann hierher zurück.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that no log files have been created yet
Title for an alert explaining that no log files have been created yet
Button to open a view for managing account settings
Button to open a view or web page where user data can be managed
Heading for a group of settings and buttons related to deleting user data
Heading for a group of settings and buttons related to exporting or saving user data

trans-unit.source: To manage data synced with iCloud or Junecloud, go to the Sync section of Settings.
trans-unit.target: Um Ihre Daten über iCloud oder Junecloud zu synchronisieren, gehen Sie zum Sync Bereich der Einstellungen.
trans-unit.note: Footer text for the Manage Your Data view, explaining that data related to sync services can be managed in the Sync section
Title for a view for managing user data, like deleting or exporting all previously saved items
Error message when a required setting is not filled in: {setting name} is required
Error message when three required settings are not filled in: {setting name}, {setting name}, and {setting name} are required
Error message when two required settings are not filled in: {setting name} and {setting name} are required
Short label for a field to enter a person's name
Setting is set to none, no selection
Setting state is off
Setting state is on
Button to look up a password in the app 1Password
Message indicating the setting is optional, not required
Short label for a password input field
Error message shown while creating an account when the two password fields do not match
Title for the preferences window on macOS
Button to reset a password

trans-unit.target: Bestätigen Sie ihre Einstellung, um fortzufahren.
trans-unit.note: Message for a view where previously used settings can be restored
Title for a view where previously used settings can be restored
Button to send data to Junecloud
Title for an alert shown when an email message could not be sent

trans-unit.source: To send email, open the Mail app and set up an account first.
trans-unit.target: Um eine E-Mail zu verschicken, öffnen Sie die Mail App und fügen Sie einen Account hinzu.
trans-unit.note: Error message explaining that a Mail account must be set up before email messages can be sent
Title for the main settings view
Button to sign in to an account
Message showing the account that is currently signing in: Signed in as {email address}, for example 'Signed in as mike@example.com'
Used to display a Siri Shortcut invocation phrase, by adding quotes around it
Heading for a list of suggested Siri Shortcuts that can be added
Title for the Siri Shortcuts settings view
Heading for a list of Siri Shortcuts that the user has set up for their own use
Error message shown when a feature requires a subscription and there is no active subscription
Title for sync settings view
Button used to agree to the Terms of Service
Title for a Terms of Service page, a list of conditions the user must agree to before continuing
Setting state is unknown or loading
Short message indicating that beta subscription access is currently active
Short message indicating that beta subscription access has expired

trans-unit.target: Sparen Sie %@ mit einem jährlichen Abo.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of how much a yearly subscription saves compared to a monthly subscription: Save {percentage} with a yearly subscription.
Subscription status: Your {subscription name} expired {date}
Subscription status: Expires on {date}

trans-unit.source: %@ for the first year then %@ per year
trans-unit.target: %@ für das erste Jahr dann %@ pro Jahr
trans-unit.note: Label for a button to purchase a subscription that includes an introductory offer: {initial price} for the first year, then {regular price} per year

trans-unit.source: This is a limited-time introductory offer.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist ein zeitlich begrenztes Kennenlernangebot.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that an introductory offer is only available for a limited time
Button to open a view with additional information about subscriptions
Button to open a view with additional information about subscriptions
Short message indicating that a previous purchase was found, unlocking additional features
Button to open a view in the App Store where subscriptions can be changed or canceled
Indicator of how often a subscription renews. Appears after a price, for example '$0.99 / month'
Indicator of how often a subscription renews. Appears after a price, for example '$3.99 / year'
Subscription status: Renews on {date}
Button to restore any previous purchases made for this app

trans-unit.source: No active subscription was found for your Apple ID.
trans-unit.target: Für Ihre Apple ID wurde kein aktives Abo gefunden.
trans-unit.note: Restore purchases failed message
Restore purchases failed title
Subscription state: active
Subscription state: busy, currently unknown
Subscription state: expired, no longer available
Subscription state: legacy, the app was purchased before subscriptions
Subscription state: none, no subscription
Subscription state: pending, recently purchased but not finalized
Button to open the subscription view to purchase a subscription
A character that appears between two sentences, for example a space. This may be used to combine Expired.Message, Subscribe.Message.Legacy, and Subscribe.Message.
Title for the subscription view

trans-unit.source: Your transaction could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Transaktion konnte nicht abgeschlossen werden.
trans-unit.note: Transaction failed message
Transaction failed title
Button to try again when there's an error

trans-unit.source: App Store purchases are not available. Make sure you have a working internet connection, or try again later.
trans-unit.target: App Store Käufe sind nicht möglich. Stellen Sie sicher, dass Ihre Internetverbindung funktioniert und probieren Sie es erneut.
trans-unit.note: Subscriptions unavailable message, possibly due to internet connection

trans-unit.source: App Store purchases are not available.
trans-unit.target: App Store Käufe sind nicht möglich.
trans-unit.note: Subscriptions unavailable message
Subscriptions unavailable title
Short string indicating an update is in progress
Short message indicating syncing with iCloud is in progress
Short message indicating syncing with Junecloud is in progress
Short message indicating syncing with iPhone is in progress
Short message indicating syncing with Apple Watch is in progress

trans-unit.source: A message has been sent to %@ to confirm your address. Check your email and follow the instructions to activate your Junecloud Sync account.
trans-unit.target: Eine Nachricht wurde an %@ gesendet, um Ihre Adresse zu bestätigen. Überprüfen Sie ihre E-Mails und befolgen Sie die Anleitung, um Ihren Junecloud Sync Account zu aktivieren.
trans-unit.note: Message indicating an email has been sent with instructions for confirming a Junecloud sync account. %@ will be replaced with the email address
Short message explaining the last update failed, due to an internet connection error
Short message explaining that a subscription is required
Short message indicating loading is in progress
Short message indicating iCloud is unavailable
Short message explaining when the last update was. 'Updated {date}', for example 'Updated a moment ago' or 'Updated 3 minutes ago'
Short message explaining the data has never been updated
Action to open the current web page in Safari
Title for an error when a web page failed to load
Short message indicating that a web page is loading
Button used to save a password entered on a web page

trans-unit.source: Passwords are saved securely in the keychain.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that if a password is saved, it will be saved securely in the keychain

trans-unit.source: Would you like to save this password?
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert asking whether to save a password
